Description: Join us on Sunday for the Annual Meeting Opening Ceremony, as we welcome attendees to the return of the in-person meeting in New Orleans. This yearly tradition marks the start of four days filled with outstanding and innovative science. Highlights of this year’s Opening Ceremony will feature a live performance by the Preservation Hall All-Stars Jazz Band; a special 115th Anniversary video marking the progress of the AACR as the Driving Force to Eradicate Cancer; presentation of the Inaugural AACR James S. Ewing-Thema B. Dunn Award for Outstanding Achievement in Pathology in Cancer Research; presentation of the Inaugural Victoria’s Secret Global Fund for Women’s Cancers 2022 Meritorious Awards, In Partnership with Pelotonia and AACR; presentation of the Inaugural AACR Award for Outstanding Achievement in Blood Cancer Research award; introduction of the 2022 class of Fellows of the AACR Academy; remarks from FDA Commissioner Robert M. Califf; and many other important recognitions and awards. Don't miss this exciting event!
Title: Opening Ceremony
